name: Keto Bacon Cheeseburger Soup
author: Soup Loving Nicole
summary: This keto-friendly soup recipe delivers all the flavors you crave in a bacon cheeseburger, without the bun. You won't even miss it.
ingredients: 1 head romaine lettuce, chopped into bite-sized pieces
directions: Heat a large soup pot over medium-high heat and add bacon
Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate
Add beef to the soup pot and flatten with a spatula
Cook until bottom is browned, about 5 minutes
Flip and cook other side, about 5 minutes more
Add broth, Cheddar cheese, cream cheese, pickles, tomato paste, steak sauce, mustard, onion powder, chili powder, and black pepper
Mix well to combine, breaking meat into smaller pieces
Reduce heat to low; cook and stir until cream cheese is melted, about 3 minutes
Cover and cook soup for 25 minutes more
Divide lettuce between bowls and fold into soup
Crumble 1 slice of cooked bacon into each bowl and garnish with tomatoes and red onion
